locale.description: This should always be set to this file's locale

extension_description.message: Advanced Eyedropper, Colour Picker, Gradient Generator and other colourful goodies
extension_description.description: Eyedropper is the tool used to sample colours from an image, Colour Picker Panel is a dialog where you can choose and adjust colours in various ways

pick_color_from_page.description: Starts the Eyedropper / Colour Picker tool to let the user sample colour from a specific page location

page_color_picker_active.description: Indicates to the user that the Eyedropper / Colour Picker has been activated and is currently active

color_picker_panel.description: The Colour Picker Panel is a dialog that allows to choose colours from a palette or specify a colour using RGB, HEX, HSL, or other colour models. This is different from the Eyedropper tool that picks colours from pages etc.

resample_last_location.description: Gets the colour of the last location sampled with the Eyedropper tool. Used for cases where the location might have changed or had a hover state

picked_color_history.description: The history of colours that the user picked

webpage_color_analyzer.description: A tool that analyses web pages, extracts the colours present, their definitions and elements

palette_browser.description: A tool that presents various colour palettes and their colours

css_gradient_generator.description: A tool that allows users to create various CSS-based gradients

whats_new.description: News and updates about the app

about_colorzilla.description: Shows information about the app, its author, version etc

css_color_analysis_results.description: The colours found in various CSS definitions on this page

ok.description: The Ok option, e.g. in a dialog

cancel.description: The Cancel option, e.g. in a dialog

copy_to_clipboard_menu_label.description: This allows the user to copy the current colour to clipboard using various special colour formats - RGB, HEX etc.

copy_with_param.description: Copy a string to clipboard, the string is provided using the parameter

chrome_doesn_allow_picking_special_page.message: Chrome doesn't allow picking colours from this special page
chrome_doesn_allow_picking_special_page.description: A warning for the user that the Colour Picker / Eyedropper cannot pick colours from the current page

chrome_doesn_allow_picking_webstore.message: Chrome doesn't allow picking colours from Chrome Web Store pages
chrome_doesn_allow_picking_webstore.description: A warning for the user that the Colour Picker / Eyedropper cannot pick colours from the current page, because its a Chrome Web Store page

chrome_doesn_allow_picking_local.message: Your browser doesn't allow picking colours from local pages
chrome_doesn_allow_picking_local.description: A warning for the user that the Colour Picker / Eyedropper cannot pick colours from the current page, because its a local (non web-based) page

allow_access_to_file_urls.message: Click and enable "Allow access to file URLs"
allow_access_to_file_urls.description: Instructs the user to enable access to 'file' URLs - special URLs hosted locally

clear_history_question.description: A confirmation question asking user to confirm clearing/erasing the entire colour history

color_history_label.description: Label of the Colour History panel etc.

new_color_label.description: Signifies newly selected colour in the Colour Picker UI

current_color_label.description: Signifies previously selected colour (which is the last current colour) in the Colour Picker UI

analyzing_please_wait.description: Indicates to user that the tool is Analysing colours, and requests the user to wait until it completes the analysis

palette_name_huesandbrightnesses.description: A palette with various colour hues and colour brightnesses

palette_name_huesandsaturations.description: A palette with various colour hues and colour saturations

palette_name_w3cnamedcolors.description: A palette with various colours that have basic standard W3C names

palette_name_webcolorsbyhue.description: A palette with various Web colours organised by their hue value

palette_name_webnamedcolors.description: A palette with various colours that have names in Web standards

palette_name_websafecolors.description: A palette that has colours that are considered Web Safe - they are displayed consistently over the widest variety of displays

palette_name_xnamedcolors.description: A palette with various colours that have names in X-Windows standards

eyedropper.description: The tool that allows users to pick/sample colours from screen/webpages/images etc.

show_magnifier.description: An option that shows a magnified view of the sampled area while picking/sampling colours

temporarily_show_hide_by_holding_shift.message: Temporarily show/hide by holding the 'Shift' key.
temporarily_show_hide_by_holding_shift.description: This allows temporarily showing or hiding the magnifier by holding the 'Shift' key while picking colours

auto_start_eyedropper_when_button_clicke.message: Automatically start eyedropper when main button is clicked.
auto_start_eyedropper_when_button_clicke.description: An option that starts the colour sampling (eyedropper) mode immediately after the main app button is clicked, without needing to click on a menu item

outline_hovered_elements.description: An option that outlines with a line the HTML element the users cursor is currently hovering/positioned over

change_cursor_to_crosshair.description: An option that changes the cursor to crosshair (a cross) while the user is sampling the colours from the page with the eyedropper tool

dont_move_document_down_when_sampling.message: Don't move document down when sampling.
dont_move_document_down_when_sampling.description: An option that prevents the document from moving down to make room for the tool UI, when the eyedropper is active.

auto_copy.description: Auto copy a colour or similar to clipboard after being picked/sampled

auto_copy_picked_to_clipboard.message: Automatically copy picked colour to clipboard.
auto_copy_picked_to_clipboard.description: Auto copy the picked/sampled colour to clipboard

auto_copy_format.description: The format to use when auto-copying the colour to clipboard

color_format.description: The format of a colour to use - eg. RGB, HEX, HSL etc.

show_hex_codes_lowercase.description: An option to show HEX-formatted colour values in lowercase (eg. #dddddd vs #DDDDDD)

keyboard_shortcuts.description: Combination of keys to activate the tool etc.

enable_keyboard_shortcuts.message: Enable colour picking from page using keyboard shortcut.
enable_keyboard_shortcuts.description: An option to enable the user to use a keyboard shortcut to activate the eyedropper/colour picker tool

keyboard_shortcut_label.description: Label for a keyboard shortcut to use

save_button_label.description: An action that allows the user to save the currently selected options/values

options_saved.description: A confirmation message indicating to user that their selected options have been saved

version.description: The version of the app (e.g v3.4)

home_page.description: Home page of the app etc.

licensing.description: The various legal info relating to license of the product

attributions.description: The attributions of various elements used in the products etc.

color_picker_by.description: Specifies and gives attribution to the authors of the Colour Picker tool

close_and_stop_picking.description: Close the tool and stop picking colours from the page

collapse_this_panel.description: Collapse the panel - make it more compact visually

expand_this_panel.description: Expand the panel - make it full size visually

color_copied_to_clipboard.description: The colour has been copied to user's clipboard

color_picked.description: The colour was successfully sampled/picked from the screen

point_sample.description: This mode samples one 1x1 pixel/point for the current colour

3x3_average.description: This mode takes a 3x3 pixel window around the current cursor location, and averages the colour value across this area

5x5_average.description: This mode takes a 5x5 pixel window around the current cursor location, and averages the colour value across this area

11x11_average.description: This mode takes a 11x11 pixel window around the current cursor location, and averages the colour value across this area

25x25_average.description: This mode takes a 25x25 pixel window around the current cursor location, and averages the colour value across this area

selection_average.description: This mode allows the user to select a certain visual portion of the current screen and the colour will be determined by averaging all the pixel within this user-selected area

sampling.description: Indicates to the user that the tool is currently sampling the screen for colours

select_area_to_sample.description: Instructs the user to select an area from the screen so this area's pixels can be averaged into one sampled colour

pick_color_from_outside_the_browser.description: Allows picking colours from anywhere on user's screen, including from outside the browser

pick_color_from_anywhere.message: Pick colours from anywhere, including outside the browser...
pick_color_from_anywhere.description: Tells the user they can pick a colour from any screen location, including outside the browser window

report_translation_issue.description: Allows the user to report incorrect or inaccurate translations

help_translate_colorzilla.description: Asks users to help translate ColorZilla into different languages

new_feature_label.description: The text of a badge that's displayed next to menu items to indicate to users that the feature is new

new_color_commit.description: Indicates that this is the newly selected colour, and by pressing OK the user can commit - make it the current colour

click_to_revert.message: Click To Revert To Original Colour
click_to_revert.description: Indicates that clicking will revert the colour selection to previously selected colour

commit_to_this_color.description: Using this option will make the selected colour active.

cancel_and_revert.message: Cancel And Revert To Original Colour
cancel_and_revert.description: Cancel the colour selection and revert to the previous colour

set_to_hue_color_mode.description: Sets the current mode to select colours by hue

set_to_sat_color_mode.description: Sets the current mode to select colours by saturation

set_to_val_color_mode.description: Sets the current mode to select colours by brightnesses

set_to_red_color_mode.description: Sets the current mode to select colours by amount of red

set_to_green_color_mode.description: Sets the current mode to select colours by amount of green

set_to_blue_color_mode.description: Sets the current mode to select colours by amount of blue

enter_hue_value.description: Allows the user to enter the hue value into the box

enter_sat_value.description: Allows the user to enter the saturation value into the box

enter_val_value.description: Allows the user to enter the brightness value into the box

enter_red_value.description: Allows the user to enter the red component of the colour into the box

enter_green_value.description: Allows the user to enter the green component of the colour into the box

enter_blue_value.description: Allows the user to enter the blue component of the colour into the box

enter_hex_value.description: Allows the user to enter the colour in hex format into the box
